question: 16 Which port trust organises 'Sabka Saath Sabka Vikas Sammelan' at Tenkasi in Tamil Nadu?
explanation: Sabka Saath Sabka Vikas Sammelan' organised by V.O. Chidambaranar Port Trust at Esakki Mahal in Tenkasi in Tirunelveli district of Tamil Nadu. The Union Minister of State for Road Transport & Highways and Shipping Shri Pon. Radhakrishnan opened the centre has implemented various schemes like Ujwala, Jan Dhan Yojana and Skill Development for the benefit of the weaker sections of the society.
